featured.text: President Theodore Roosevelt officially gave the White House its current name in 1901. 41.

definition.zh_def: 美國的總統，特別是富蘭克林·德拉諾·羅斯福，他在大蕭條和第二次世界大戰期間擔任總統。
definition.en_def: The surname of two U.S. presidents, particularly Franklin D. Roosevelt, who served during the Great Depression and World War II.
definition.example: Franklin D. Roosevelt implemented the New Deal to help recover the economy.
